5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: Cabir bin Abdillah (r.a.)'den şöyle demiştir: Resulullah (Sallallahu Aleyhi ve Sellem) bize Kur'an'dan sure öğretir gibi teşehhüdü öğretirdi:

chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the Tashah-hud (sitting posture)
